question: You have recently ordered a book online, but the book was delayed and has not arrived yet. Write a letter to the company manager. In the letter, you should:– give the details of your order.– explain why you need the book urgently.– suggest a solution for the situation.
text: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction regarding your delivery service last week, as I vividly remember I bought ACCA books from your online website but still to date my product has not reached yet today and that is the reason I am writing to you to resolve the matter promptly firstly I would like to share you brief details of my order it basically was P7and P6 Books and order number was ACCA2437903 made on last Friday at 5.30 pm. furthermore I already mentioned below comment section about the urgency and paid the amount from a credit card on advance.

Secondly, why I am in hurry? the reason is that my ACCA exam will be held on next month and I do have not ample time for preparations so I need to be well-prepared for my examination and to pass it very first attempt therefore I need it promptly without wasting a little more time.

Finally, I have a suggestion in order to manage it if you could able to send me a PDF book or e-book of that version directly to my mail address until the availability of books arrived at me. otherwise, it will be a huge loss in my study.
I am waiting for your prompt response and action
